1: <pb/>Noq xqajik cho nah yuuq' i Jesús, ma' k'isiin i tinamit xi tahqinik reje reh.
2: Eh jinaj i winaq aj rax q'aah xujil i koq riib' ruuk' i Jesús, xuxuk'aa' riib' chuwach, je' wili i xuq'or reh: <pb/>Jaaw, nee ta nawaaj, nee naq kinak'achrisaj ruuk' i nuyab'ilaal, inki.
3: <pb/>Re' Jesús xutz'a'j reje i yowaab', je' wili i xuq'or reh: <pb/>Tiwaaj kaat nuk'achrisam. Tik'aachjoq inki. <pb/>Eh re' aj rax q'aah, jumehq'iil xk'achjik xelik i rax q'aah chi riij.
4: Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or reh: <pb/>Ma' awach eh aq'or i xnub'an aweh. Hiy la', cha k'uhtaaj chaawiib' chuwach i k'amal kib'eeh aj tiij, eh chayeew amayiij ruq'orom chaloq i Moisés, reh chi neenkinab'eej chi xatk'achjik chik, i nuchjik.
5: <pb/>Noq xokik i Jesús pan tinamit Capernaum, jinaj i aj Roma k'amal kib'eeh i soldado, xujil i koq riib' chupahqaljiik otob'il ree Jesús,
6: je' wili xuq'or reh: <pb/>Jaaw, re' numoso yoklik cho pampaat ruum yab'ilaal. Re' reh sikrinaq i ruti'jolal, k'ahchi' rik'iik chi ti' k'axik, inki.
7: <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or reh: <pb/>Re' hin nee kinooj chuk'achreesjiik amoso, i nuchjik.
8: <pb/>Re' k'amal kib'eeh i soldado je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Jaaw, ma' ruk'ul ta chi weh chi netiooj panupaat. Xa cha taq'aaj la' ruq'orariik reh chi neenk'achjik inumoso.
9: Neetinimjik, Chawil i hin, atoob' ta wilik kitaaq'anik weh, kinkinimaj wo' taqe nu soldado. Noq neenuq'or reh jino'q chi ohoq, nee wo' nooj. Eh kim ayu', kinko'q reh jino'q, nee wo' nchalik. Eh noq neenutaq'aaj i numoso chi kamanik, nee wo' nooj, inki.
10: <pb/>Eh noq xrib'iraj i Jesús chi je' re', xsahchik ruk'ux, je' wili i xuq'or keh i kitahqinik reh: <pb/>Xti korik i nuq'or chi ma' jank'al ta nureq jino'q ar Israel xti ruye'em ruk'ux je' rukab' i winaq wili inki.
11: Re' hin i nuq'or taq aweh chi ma' k'isiin taqe i naa kichaliik parelb'aal q'iij, parookb'aal q'iij, naa kokiik pa runimaal rajaawriik i Dios, eh naa kianam kiwa' ar ruuk' i Abraham, ruuk' i Isaac, ruuk' i Jacob.
12: Eh re' taqe i ye'ooj naq q'ab' keh chi naa kokiik pa runimaal rajaawriik i Dios naakikutariik cho panq'equm. Ar naa koq'iim, eh naakiqirich'eem naah i keeh, inki.
13: <pb/>Eh re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or reh i k'amal kib'eeh soldado: <pb/>Hiy panapaat. Neenb'aan aha' wilik i xapahqaaj, ruum chi aye'em ak'ux, inki. <pb/>Eh chupaam i jumehq' re' re', xk'achjik i rumoso i winaq re' re'.
14: <pb/>Noq xooj k'oloq i Jesús parupaat i Pedro, xponik rureq i rutuut i rehk'een i Pedro chi yoklik pan yokaab', ruum k'ahchi' i kaq tz'a' chi riij.
15: Xrilow chi je' re' i Jesús, xuchop chi q'ab' i yowaab', eh jumehq'iil xik'ik i kaq tz'a' chi riij. Xwuktik johtoq ixoq re' re', eh re' chik i reh xutoq'aa' cho yej-anik kiwa'.
16: <pb/>Noq xokik i q'iij, ma' k'isiin wilik ma' tob'laj uxlab'al kuuk' xkik'am cho chuwach i Jesús. Re' reh xa ruuk' i ruq'oral xukaaj taqe reje i ma' tob'laj uxlab'al, eh xuk'achrisaj taqe chu'nchel i yowaab'.
17: Reh chi xooj eloq wach i ruq'orom chaloq i Isaías jalal ruq'oral i Dios chi je' wili: Re' reh x-eesanik i ruti'kiil qak'ux, eh re' reh xk'amwik i qayab'ilaal, inki.
18: <pb/>Eh noq xrilow i Jesús chi ma' k'isa tinamit i wilik chi junsuut, xuq'or keh i raj tahqaneel chi kiq'ahxoq reje chi juntar i k'isa palaw.
19: Eh jinaj ink'uhtanik ree k'uhb'aal xujil i koq riib' ruuk' i Jesús, je' wili i xuq'or reh: <pb/>Hat aj Tijoom, re' hin tiwaaj kaat nutahqeem xa aha' pa' netiooj, inki.
20: <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or reh: <pb/>Re' taqe yaak wilik kijuul, eh re' taqe chikop kirupinik wilik wo' kisuuq'. Raaj i hin, i xnuyejaa' wiib' chi winaq, ma' xta nupaat nuhi'limb'aal, inki.
21: <pb/>Eh jinaj re' ruuk' taqe raj tahqaneel, i Jesús je' wili xuq'or: <pb/>Jaaw, chayee pee q'ab' weh chi nenooj numuq'aa' i wajaaw, kora'j nee kinooj chawiij re', inki.
22: <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili xuq'or reh: <pb/>Taq la' chi wiij cha kanaa' taqe i kamnaq chi re' keh neekimuq'anik reh i kikamnaaq, i nuchjik.
23: <pb/>Chi riij i re', re' Jesús xjohtik pan barco ruch'ihil taqe raj tahqaneel.
24: Eh noq ik'ik chik inki a'n chinaah i k'isa palaw, jinaj i kowlaj teew xchalik. Re' rub'ohl i palaw k'ahchi' naq chik rutz'apam naah i barco. Eh re' Jesús wirik i rub'an.
25: Eh re' taqe i raj tahqaneel, xooj kuksaj i Jesús je' wili i xkiq'or reh: <pb/>Jaaw, Jaaw, wukteen qoh ako'leej k'ahchi' qojiik qohoq ri'si ha' inki taqe.
26: <pb/>Re' Jesús je' wili i xuq'or keh: <pb/>¿Chihreet noq ma' k'isiin taq ayo'jiik? Ma' aye'em ta taq ak'ux chi nimanik, inki. <pb/>Eh xwuktik johtoq, xupab'aa' i kowlaj teew i rub'ohl i palaw, eh xanoq wo' kitz'iriwanik.
27: Noq xkilow chi je' re' i wilkeeb' pan barco, xsahchik kik'ux, xkipahqaaj chikiwach chi je' wili: <pb/>¿Awach aj wo' winaq wili? Inimjik inche ruum i teew, ruum i palaw, inki taqe.
28: <pb/>Eh noq xponik i Jesús chi juntar i k'isa palaw paruyuq'ul i Gadara, ki'ib' i winaq wilik ma' tob'laj uxlab'al kuuk', xi elik chaloq pankijuleel kamnaq, eh xkijil i koq kiib' ruuk' i Jesús. Re' keh xayohb'aal chik wach i kijosq'iil ma' awach taj inik'ik chupaam i b'eeh re' re'.
29: <pb/>Eh kow xkiq'or chi je' wili: <pb/>Jesús, hat Rak'uun i Dios ¿Chib'ih reet noq inchalik amin awiib' quuk'? ¿Mi xat chalik ayu' re' chub'anariik qeh i ti' k'axik noq komajaa' i rureq i ruq'ijil? inki taqe.
30: <pb/>Eh ma' najt ta ar wilkeeb' i ma' k'isa ahq k'uxuj ch'ahn inki a'n
31: Eh re' taqe ma' tob'laj uxlab'al xkipahqaaj otob'il ree Jesús, chi je' wili: <pb/>Wila' nakooj awesam kuuk' winaq wili, chayeew q'ab' qeh chi nee qoh okik chi kipaam taqe ahq wulu', inki taqe.
32: <pb/>Hiy taq, ki uchjik ruum i Jesús. <pb/>Re' taqe ma' tob'laj uxlab'al xi elik kuuk' i winaq, xi okik chi kipaam taqe ahq. <pb/>Re' taqe ma' k'isa ahq re' re' xkikutib'eej kiib' pan b'oqeel, pank'isa palaw xiooj q'ehb'oq, eh ar xijihq'ik.
33: Re' taqe cha'jen ahq xi elik kajiim ruum kiyo'jiik. Noq xi ponik pan tinamit, xkitoq'aa' ruk'utjiik chu'nchel i re', je' wo' hoq i xb'aan kuuk' taqe winaq wilik naq ma' tob'laj uxlab'al kuuk'.
34: Noq xkib'iraj taqe tinamit chi je' re', chi kunchelaal xiooj aha' wilik wii' i Jesús. Eh noq xkilow wach, xkipahqaaj otob'il reh chi eloq reje pankiyuq'ul.
